commentaries.author: Augustine
commentaries.excerpt: God's love is shown not in words, but in deeds. He gave His only Son, demonstrating the height and depth of divine charity.

commentaries.author: John Calvin
commentaries.excerpt: This verse teaches us that faith in Christ is the only way to eternal life. The love of God is the first cause, faith in Christ is the second cause.

commentaries.author: John Wesley
commentaries.excerpt: God so loved the world - His tender love toward all sinners, even those who continue in sin. That he gave - In the greatest proof of love. His only begotten Son - Who is one with Him from eternity.
